infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Amoraea needs your location to help you find compatible matches.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Amoraea needs access to your photos to upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Amoraea needs access to your contacts to sync them with the app and find matches.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Amoraea to use your location.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow Amoraea to sync your contacts with the app to find matches.

plugins.microphonePermission: Amoraea uses the microphone so you can answer Aria's questions by voice.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Amoraea uses speech recognition to turn your voice answers into text.
